question: Who won the women's all-around title in world gymnastics championships?
explanation: Morgan Hurd from America won the women's all-around title in world gymnastics championships at Montreal's Olympic Stadium. The 16-year-old won the United States' seventh straight Olympic or world all-around title by edging out Canada's Elsabeth Black 55.232 to 55.132. U.S. champion Ragan Smith withdrew minutes before the competition with an ankle injury.
